game.name: Number Dungeon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A quick strategy roguelike in a dungeon where you need to carefully use what the room gives you to get past it. Clear set dungeons to win, or see how far you can make it in endless!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A quick strategy roguelike in a dungeon where you need to carefully use what the room gives you to get past it. Clear set dungeons to win, or see how far you can make it in endless!
